title: Golf Whistle
summaries: The Golf Whistle is a tool used in golf purchased from the Golfer for 10 GC. It allows a player to recover Golf Balls, returning it to the previous position before it was hit. Using the Golf Whistle adds 1 to the player's golf score, as a penalty.

statistics.Tooltip:
Returns your last hit Golf Ball to its previous position
Has a one stroke penalty
statistics.Buy: 10 GC
statistics.Sell: 2 GC
